title: When Gracie Met The Grump
description: Of all the things that could have landed in her yard… it had to be him.For most people, finding a half-naked superbeing in their yard might be a dream come true.Unfortunately for Gracie Castro, it’s the exact opposite.Especially when he’s grouchy, rude, and shows no signs of leaving anytime soon. But when a hero of mankind needs you, you do what you have to.Even if it compromises everything you know.And totally changes your life.
author: Mariana Zapata
